rooms.description: Entry hall leading into the living and kitchen area.
Open-plan space combining a modern kitchen with integrated dining and living area. Includes kitchen island and ample seating arrangements as per Vastu.
Dedicated workspace positioned to maximize natural light and minimal distractions.
Space for laundry, storage of appliances.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the positive Vastu direction.
Large windows for ample natural light and maintaining energy flow.

levels.building_norms: Complies with local Indian building codes.
levels.vastu_principles: Designed with alignment to Vastu principles, ensuring prosperity and positive energy flow.
